availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph DeWitt Duncan (Jefferson County, Kentucky, lawyer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, lawyer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas H. Duncan and Lucretia Duncan. Married to Eliza S. English Duncan in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 5, 1865. Attended school in Hardin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Hardin County in 1850. Resident in Hardin County in 1860. Household owned five enslaved persons in Hardin County in 1860. Attended Centre College in Boyle County, Kentucky, in 1862. Lawyer in Jefferson County, Kentucky.

ab.bibl:

Thirty-Eighth Annual Catalogue of the Officers and Students of Centre College, Danville, Kentucky, for the Year 1862, (Frankfort, KY: A. G. Hodges, Printer, 1862), 9.
